attributes.long-description:
In "Double Visions", the 4th episode of this 5 game series, the Hill Valley Expo has arrived! Back in 1986, Marty and First Citizen Brown must join forces to create an epic invention so that he can prevent the young Emmett Brown from making the worst mistake of his life.

* New Back to the Future story across 5 episodes released monthly.
* Featuring Michael J Fox and Christopher Lloyd likenesses, with Christopher Lloyd returning to voice Doc.
* Back to the Future's 'first families'. The McFlys, Browns, and of course, the Tannens – all play key roles.
* Collaboration with Trilogy Co-Creator/Writer Bob Gale to help in shaping the storyline.

You will download new episodes each month as they release, locating them through "View All by Title" and selecting "Back to the Future: The Game."

attributes.name: Back to the Future™: Episode 4 - Double Visions
